snippet: A federal judge on Friday ruled that the United States government must release photographs showing the abuse of detainees in American custody at the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq and other sites.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Alvin K Hellerstein orders Defense Department to release photos of detainee abuse at sites including Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday ruled that the United States government must release photographs showing the abuse of detainees in American custody at the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq and other sites.

headline.main: Federal Judge Orders U.S. Government to Release Photos of Abu Ghraib Abuse
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Orders U.S. Government to Release Photos of Abu Ghraib Abuse

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
